sentence.Network_en: Any sort of wrong-doing had to be rooted out.
sentence.Network_cn: 必须杜绝任何不道德的事发生。

sentence.Network_en: This tradition is also firmly rooted in the past.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个传统同样深深地植根于过去。

sentence.Network_en: The crisis is rooted in deep rivalries between the two groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 这场危机的根源是这两个群体之间积怨已深的敌对情绪。

entry.tran: 起源于…的;根源于…的;由…产生的
entry.def: If you say that one thing is rooted in another, you mean that it is strongly influenced by it or has developed from it.

example.ex: The crisis is rooted in deep rivalries between the two groups.
example.tran: 这场危机的根源是这两个群体之间积怨已深的敌对情绪。

example.ex: ...powerful songs rooted in traditional African music.
example.tran: 起源于传统非洲音乐的打动人心的歌曲

entry.tran: （观点、感受）根深蒂固的，难以改变的
entry.def: If someone has deeply rooted opinions or feelings, they believe or feel something extremely strongly and are unlikely to change.

example.ex: Racism is a deeply rooted prejudice which has existed for thousands of years.
example.tran: 种族主义是存在了几千年的根深蒂固的偏见。

entry.tran: （因害怕或吃惊）呆住，不能动弹
entry.def: If you are rooted to the spot, you are unable to move because you are very frightened or shocked.

example.ex: We just stopped there, rooted to the spot.
example.tran: 我们一下子就停在了那里，呆若木鸡。

auth_sentence.content: Many tracks here seem rooted in an ineffable sadness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many tracks here seem rooted in an ineffable sadness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many tracks here seem rooted in an ineffable sadness.

auth_sentence.content: Questions rooted in dogma, I tend to ignore.
auth_sentence.res_content: Questions rooted in dogma, I tend to ignore.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Questions rooted in dogma, I tend to ignore.

auth_sentence.content: He says rapprochement is rooted in the Korean psyche.
auth_sentence.res_content: He says rapprochement is rooted in the Korean psyche.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He says rapprochement is rooted in the Korean psyche.

Sentence.sentence: Although Kodak anticipated the inevitable rise of digital photography, its corporate（企业的） culture was too rooted in the successes of the past for it to make the clean break necessary to fully embrace the future.

Twitter's huge success is rooted in the simple but profound insight that in a medium with infinite space for self-expression, the most interesting thing we can do is restrict ourselves to 140 characters.

sentences.en: She was rooted to her seat because she was afraid to speak in front of a large group.
sentences.cn: 她因害怕在大庭广众前说话而坐定不动。

means.word_mean: (因为惧怕或吃惊而)钉在原地，呆若木鸡

sentences.en: He shouted at her to run, but she just stood there, glued to the spot.
sentences.cn: 他冲她喊，叫她快跑，可是她呆立在那里，腿都挪不开。

sentences.en: She stood there rooted to the spot when she saw the body.
sentences.cn: 她看见那具尸体后吓得迈不开步，呆立在那里。
